title: Wolves and Roses
description: Shifters, romance and adventure combine in the modern fairy tale that USA TODAY calls "Must-read paranormal romance!" FAIRY TALES OF THE MAGICORUM1. Wolves And Roses2. Moonlight and Midtown3. Shifters And Glyphs4. Slippers And Thieves5. Bandits and Ball Gowns
